prompt.name: What is the tag name?
prompt.content: What is the content of the tag?

del.perms: You don't have permission to delete that tag.

prompt.name: What is the tag name?
prompt.content: What is the new content of the tag?

edit.perms: You don't have permission to edit that tag.
edit.success: Tag **{{name}}** was edited successfully with new content `{{content}}`!

description: A tag command where you can make notes.

extended.explainedHelp: It can give you a chunk of text stored under a specific name.
explainedUsage:
Whether to
  - Shows a tag.
  - Creates a tag.
  - Deletes a tag.
  - Edits an existing tag.
  - Shows information about a tag,
  - Lists all the tags.
The new content of the tag.
examples: create welcome Welcome to our server!
